name: 天使帝國四《Empire of Angels IV》
description: This is a SLG game that developed by SOFTSTAR in Taiwan. Is a dramatic, beautiful painting, use full-time vocal and funniest 3D game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP,Windows 7,Windows 8 (32 or 64 bit) Processor: Intel Core Duo2 3.0Ghz or AMD equivalent (or better)  Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GForce 9600GT or ATI equivalent (512MB or better)  DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: Direct compatible sound card for audio Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse are required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP,Windows 7,Windows 8 (32 or 64 bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 2.80 GHz or AMD equivalent (or better) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 260 or ATI Radeon HD 4870 (1GB or better)  DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space Sound Card: Direct compatible sound card for audio Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse are required
